reference.title: javainterface
reference.shortdesc: The <javainterface> element is a reference to a Java interface.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <javainterface> element can be used to reference a Java interface from another topic type.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <task id="httpxml"> <title>Getting an XML file through an HTTP connection</title> <taskbody> <steps> <step><cm>Open the connection</cm> <info>You can use <javainterface keyref="com.ibm.xtools.patterns.framework.uml2.IDefaultComponentExportDataModel">IDefaultComponentExportDataModel interface</javainterface> in a Java application.</info> </step> ... </steps> </taskbody> </task>
